properties.Name: SalesRepresentativeAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Agreement becomes effective.

Columns.Name: ProductsToBeRepresentedOrSoldSection
Columns.Description: The specific products that the Sales Representative may sell in their assigned territory.

Columns.Name: TerritorySection
Columns.Description: The specific geographic territory in which the Sales Representative may operate.

Columns.Name: AppointmentSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies whether the Sales Representative is an exclusive/non-exclusive sales representative in the territory specified.

Columns.Name: GeneralDutiesSection
Columns.Description: A description of the duties to be performed by the sales representative on behalf of the company or legal entity.

Columns.Name: ReservedRightsSection
Columns.Description: This section clarifies if the company has retained the right to sell directly in the same territory assigned the sales representative.

Columns.Name: ConflictOfInterestSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that the sales representative may not also represent competing products.

Columns.Name: IndependentContractorSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies that the sales representative is an independent contractor and not an employee of the company or legal entity.

This means that the company or legal entity does not have to withhold taxes, FICA, unemployment etc. from his income nor is he provided with employee benefits.

Columns.Name: IndemnificationSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies that the sales representative and the company will indemnify each other against claims resulting from the agreement.

Typically the company agrees to reimburse the sales representative from losses due to defective products or lack of performance by the company in filling an order.   

The sales representative typically agrees to reimburse the company for losses suffered from negligent or improper acts on his part.

Columns.Name: CommissionSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies the commission formula and terms.

It also permits the sales representative to audit the company records to determine that commissions were paid properly.   Who pays for the audit and under what terms is also specified.

Columns.Name: HouseAccountsDescription
Columns.Description: This is a list of customers who are excluded from the agreement and the sales representative receives no commission from orders to these customers.

Columns.Name: CommissionsPaymentScheduleSection
Columns.Description: This section describes when and how commissions will be paid to the sales representative.

Columns.Name: SaleOfProductsSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies the terms and conditions for fulfillment of sales by the company or legal entity in response to orders submitted by the sales representative.

This section specifically addresses:

-

Columns.Name: ProductWarrantySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies who and under what conditions product warranties are extended.

Columns.Name: ProductAvailabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies the terms and conditions for which it will be held harmless if orders cannot be fulfilled in response to submittal by the sales representative.

Columns.Name: SalesRepresentativeResponsibilitiesSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies all the responsibilities that the sales representative shall fulfill such as:

- Product promotion
- Expenses
- Forecast
- Reports
- Record keeping

Columns.Name: CompanyResponsibilitiesSection
Columns.Description:
This section specifies the responsibilities of the company or legal entity such as:

- Technical assistance
- Promotions
- Advertising

Columns.Name: UseOfTrademarksTradeNamesSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies the authorization of the sales representative to use trademarks and trade names of the company.

Columns.Name: TermLengthAndTerminationSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies the length of the agreement and terms for which termination of the Agreement are appropriate.

Columns.Name: LiabilityLimitationSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that neither party will be liable to the other in case of termination except to fulfill commissions as agreed to in the contract.

Columns.Name: ConfidentialitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that the sales representative will not disclose confidential information about the company, business plans or products.

Columns.Name: AssignabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies whether or not the sales representative may assign any or all rights or obligations under the contract to a third party.

Columns.Name: SeverabilitySection
Columns.Description: This section specifies that in the condition that a section of the agreement is found to be invalid, the rest of the agreement will be in effect.

Columns.Name: LegalExpensesSection
Columns.Description: This section specifies who and how legal expenses will be settled should a legal action be brought by either party against the other party.

Properties.Description: An agreement between a company and individual or third party to represent specific products for a specific period in a specific territory.

properties.Description: An agreement between a company and individual or third party to represent specific products for a specific period in a specific territory.
